channel.title: Barrows help

item.title: Barrows help
item.dc:creator: @jarnohhh jarnohhh
item.description:
@jarnohhh wrote:

how i make so if i click on 5623 (melee pray) npcs doesnt hit anything exept verac? My code:

if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2027) { // barrow int Players = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Players]; hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2026) { // barrow int Players = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Players]; hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(50); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2028) { // barrow int Players = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Players]; hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2029) { // barrow int Players = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Players]; hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2030) { // barrow int Players = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Players]; hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); } if (npcs[NPCID].npcType == 2025) { // Ahrim int Players = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Players]; p.animation(369, p.absY, p.absX); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(24); }

-Devo base.

Read full topic
